name: CreateInvoicedOrderLineCorrection
description:
Create a correction on an already invoiced line

This can be used to refund a partial amount on a completed OrderLine, in cases where the product should still be returnable.
If the product is not returnable anymore, a return without retake should be created.

This will result in a new line what will be shipped and invoiced immediately.
Based on the AutoRefund flag, the created open amount will be refunded.
